content.text: 4 Bosc pears - peeled, cored and minced
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "4 Bosc pears - peeled, cored and minced" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "400 degrees F"@19:32 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "200 degrees C"@34:47 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Wash beets, and place in a roasting pan.
2) Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until tender. Set aside to cool.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "45 minutes to 1 hour"@12:32 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-2-0 "until tender"@37:49 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "Set aside"@51:60 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-2-0 "to cool"@61:68 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "butter"@8:14 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-3-0 "a large skillet"@18:33 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-3-0 "medium heat"@39:50 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Stir in onion, pears, sugar, and vinegar; cook, stirring frequently, for 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "cook"@45:49 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "20 minutes"@76:86 / DUR )
		:simultaneous ( ac-4-1 "stirring"@51:59 / AC
			:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		)
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-2 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@11:16 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "pears"@18:23 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "sugar"@25:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "vinegar"@36:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) When the beets are cool enough to handle, peel and coursely chop.
6) Puree onion mixture in a food processor with metal blade.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Puree"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "onion mixture"@9:22 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a food processor"@26:42 / TOOL )
		:instrument ( tool-6-1 "metal blade"@48:59 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Add salt and 1/2 of the beets; pulse 4 to 5 times.
8) Add remaining beets, and pulse 2 to 3 times.
